articles.title: Show Your Stripes Day: Hong Kong temperature rise visualised in climate warning stripes
articles.author: Kelly Ho
articles.summary: Show Your Stripes Day encourages people around the world to share graphics representing temperature changes in different countries and regions over the past century.
